title: Attempting to reconnect client
body: So I have this problem mac latest update I think it's OS SIERRA and whenever I login to lol it shows attempting to reconnect and I have to do this several times like 8-10 times keep on resetting until it works sometimes it's worse and takes 15 mins so I wanna know if there's any solutions I have wired and wireless connection . Ik riot are working on it but it's really frustrating. And would like to know any way I can solve this

replies.body: League needs to connect to many different services, but your connection might be unstable and struggling to keep up.  Swapping between connections is a good step, but I recommend going over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help rule out more possibilities.  Test it in a custom and let me know if it helps.
It's not the in game problem it's the fact I can't play so as soon as I log on it says attempting to reconnect

Your connection needs to be able to access different servers for League.  In this case it's the patching server, after that you'll need to access pvp.net, matchmaking, then the game server.  There are a log of gears and cogs in the works, and the above guide should help smooth it out.
I'll give it a try thanks
i used to have the same issue, but then it suddenly stopped. it started again after last patch, so i think its a problem with the update. let me know if anything works
